General.Name: Tong-Hwa Synthetic Fiber Co Ltd
General.Description: TongHwa Corporation manufactures and sells polyacrylonitrile synthetic fibers in the Republic of China. The company was formerly known as Tong-Hwa Synthetic Fiber Company Limited. TongHwa Corporation was founded in 1970 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.56, Xinsheng South Road, Taipei, Taiwan

2.Name: Ms. Yan Ling Ye
2.Title: Director of Fin. Department and Director of Accounting Department
